00053 CNWorkflowEngine * CNWorkflowEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00054 {
00055     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNWorkflowEngine::EngineName())
00056         return (CNWorkflowEngine *)engine;
00057     return NULL;
00058 }

00063 CNWorkflowEngine::CNWorkflowEngine()
00064 {

00066     m_pstdMethods = NULL;
00067     defineStdMethods();
00068     defineOptions();

00079 /**
00080  * @brief Initialize the data and free any memory allocated.
00081  */
00082 void CNWorkflowEngine::clear()
00083 {
00084     if (m_pstdMethods != NULL) {delete m_pstdMethods; m_pstdMethods = NULL;}
00085     if (m_apgEngine != NULL) {delete m_apgEngine; m_apgEngine = NULL;}
00086     // Clean up static data.
00087     CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->deleteAll();
00088     CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->clear();
00089     Annotation::getParams()->clear();
00090     CNAnalysisMethod::getParams()->clear();
00091 }

00100 /**
00101  * @brief Print any standard methods used by the engine
00102  * @param std::ostream& - The specified output stream
00103  */
00104 void CNWorkflowEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
00105     if (m_pstdMethods == NULL) {return;}
00106     std::map<std::string,std::string>::iterator iter;
00107     out << std::endl << "Standard Methods:" << std::endl;
00108       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00109       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00110         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
00111           maxLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00112       }
00113       for(iter = m_pstdMethods->begin(); iter != m_pstdMethods->end(); iter++) {
00114         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00115         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
00116         currentLength = (unsigned int)iter->first.size();
00117         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
00118             out.put(' ');
00119           currentLength++;
00120         }
00121         out << iter->second << std::endl;
00122       }
00123 }

00287 /**

00289  * @param const std::string& - The cel file name
00290  * @param const std::string& - The sample (arr) file name
00291  * @param const std::string& - The result (cychp) file name
00292  */
00293 void CNWorkflowEngine::addCel(const std::string& strCelFileName, const std::string& strSampleFileName, const std::string& strResultFileName)
00294 {
00295     pushOpt("cels", strCelFileName);
00296     pushOpt("arrs", strSampleFileName);
00297     pushOpt("result-files", strResultFileName);
00298 }

00360 
00361 class Analysis
00362 {
00363 public:
00364     int Order;
00365     std::string Name;
00366 
00367     AffxString getName()
00368     {
00369         AffxString str = Name;
00370         int iFindIndex = str.indexOf(".");
00371         if (iFindIndex != std::string::npos)
00372         {
00373             str = str.substring(0, iFindIndex);
00374         }
00375         return str;
00376     }
00377 
00378     int compareTo(Analysis& that, int iCompareCode)
00379     {
00380         int iCompareResult = 0;
00381         switch (iCompareCode)
00382         {
00383         case 0:
00384             iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(Order, that.Order);
00385             break;
00386         }
00387         return iCompareResult;
00388     }
00389 
00390     template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00391         bool operator()(const Analysis* lhs, const Analysis* rhs) const {
00392             Err::errAbort("CNWorkflowEngine/Analysis: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00393             return false;
00394         }
00395     };
00396 };
00397 
00398 template<> struct Analysis::ComparePred<0> {
00399     bool operator()(const Analysis* lhs, const Analysis* rhs) const {
00400         return AffxArray<int>::compare(lhs->Order, rhs->Order) < 0;
00401     }
00402 };
00403 
00404 /**
00405  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00406  */
00407 void CNWorkflowEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00408 
00409   defineStates();
00410 
00411   // not used by the engine
00412   //setLibFileOpt("config-file");
00413   setLibFileOpt("reference-input");
00414   setLibFileOpt("cdf-file");
00415   setLibFileOpt("spf-file");
00416   setLibFileOpt("qcc-file");
00417   setLibFileOpt("qca-file");
00418   setLibFileOpt("special-snps");
00419   setLibFileOpt("chrX-probes");
00420   setLibFileOpt("chrY-probes");
00421   setLibFileOpt("target-sketch");
00422   setLibFileOpt("use-feat-eff");
00423   setLibFileOpt("read-models-brlmmp");
00424 
00425   if(getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00426 
00427   if (getOpt("out-dir") == "") {error("Must specify an output directory.");}
00428   if (getOpt("temp-dir") == "") {
00429     setOpt("temp-dir", Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"temp"));
00430     Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("temp-dir"), false);
00431   }
00432 
00433   std::vector<std::string>& analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00434 
00435     if(analysis.size() == 0) {
00436         analysis.push_back("log2-ratio");
00437         analysis.push_back("allelic-difference");
00438         analysis.push_back("gaussian-smooth");
00439         analysis.push_back("cn-state");
00440         analysis.push_back("cn-gender");
00441         analysis.push_back("cn-segment");
00442         analysis.push_back("loh");
00443         analysis.push_back("loh-segment");
00444         analysis.push_back("cn-neutral-loh");
00445         analysis.push_back("normal-diploid");
00446 //        analysis.push_back("mosaicism");
00447     }
00448 
00449     // Insure proper analysis order.
00450     AffxArray<Analysis> ar;
00451     for (int i = 0; (i < analysis.size()); i++)
00452     {
00453         Analysis* p = new Analysis;
00454         p->Name = analysis[i];
00455         p->Order = CNSegment::getSegmentType(p->getName());
00456         ar.add(p);
00457     }
00458     ar.quickSort(0);
00459     for (int i = 0; (i < analysis.size()); i++)
00460     {
00461         Analysis* p = ar.getAt(i);
00462         analysis[i] = p->Name;
00463     }
00464     ar.deleteAll();
00465 
00466         if (getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data") )
00467         {
00468         error("Cannot use the --keep-intermediate-data option in apt-copynumber-workflow");
00469         }
00470 
00471 
00472     if ((getOpt("reference-input") != "") && (getOpt("reference-output") != ""))
00473     {
00474         error("Please specify either a reference-input file or a reference-output file, but not both.");
00475     }
00476     if ((getOpt("reference-input") == "") && (getOpt("reference-output") == ""))
00477     {
00478         error("Please specify either a reference-input file or a reference-output file.");
00479     }
00480     if (getOpt("reference-input") != "")
00481     {
00482         if (!isCN5Reference(getOpt("reference-input"))) {error("The reference-input specified either does not exist, or is not the correct type for the CNWorkflowEngine.");}
00483         setOpt("create-reference", "false");
00484         setOpt("reference-file", getOpt("reference-input"));
00485     }
00486     if (getOpt("reference-output") != "")
00487     {
00488         setOpt("create-reference", "true");
00489         setOpt("reference-file", getOpt("reference-output"));
00490         vector<string> celFiles;
00491         EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00492         if(celFiles.size() < 5)
00493         {
00494              Err::errAbort("At least 5 cels files must be specified when creating a reference file.");
00495         }
00496 
00497     }
00498 
00499   if(analysis.empty())
00500      error("Must specify at least one analysis to perform.");
00501 
00502     /* Read in cel file list from other file if specified. */
00503     vector<string> celFiles;
00504     EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00505     if(celFiles.size() == 0)
00506         Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00507     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00508     int celfile_count = celFiles.size();
00509 
00510     if (getOpt("brlmmp-parameters") == "")
00511     {
00512         // brlmm-p
00513 //        if (m_optsCn.m_bCreateReference) {m_optsCn.m_strBrlmmpParameters = "CM=1.mix=1.bins=100.K=2.SB=0.003.MS=0.05";}
00514 //        else {m_optsCn.m_strBrlmmpParameters = "CM=2.mix=1.bins=100.K=2.SB=0.003.MS=0.05";}
00515         // brlmm-p-plus-force
00516         if (getOptBool("create-reference")) {setOpt("brlmmp-parameters", "copynumber=true.CM=1.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.HARD=3.SB=0.45.KX=1.KH=1.5.KXX=0.5.KAH=-0.6.KHB=-0.6.transform=MVA.AAM=2.0.BBM=-2.0.AAV=0.06.BBV=0.06.ABV=0.06.copyqc=0.wobble=0.05.MS=1");}
00517         else {setOpt("brlmmp-parameters", "CM=2.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.HARD=3.SB=0.45.KX=1.KH=1.5.KXX=0.5.KAH=-0.6.KHB=-0.6.transform=MVA.AAM=2.0.BBM=-2.0.AAV=0.06.BBV=0.06.ABV=0.06.copyqc=0.wobble=0.05.MS=1");}
00518     }
00519     if ((getOptBool("create-reference")) && (getOpt("brlmmp-parameters").find(".MS=1") == std::string::npos))
00520     {
00521         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: The Score Threshold is recommended to be set to 1 when creating a reference model file.");
00522     }
00523 
00524     if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") == "") {setOpt("set-analysis-name", "CN5");}
00525     if (getOptBool("run-geno-qc"))
00526     {
00527         setOpt("geno-qc-file", Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".GenoQC.txt"));
00528     }
00529 //    if ((popts->m_iCnChpVersion < 1) || (popts->m_iCnChpVersion > 2)) {popts->errAbort("Invalid CNCHP version: " + ::getInt(popts->m_iCnChpVersion));}
00530     if (getOpt("annotation-file") == "") {error("Must specify an annotation-file.");}
00531     if (getOpt("cdf-file") == "" && getOpt("spf-file") == "") {error("Must specify a cdf-file or spf-file.");}
00532     if (getOpt("out-dir") == "") {error("Must specify an output directory.");}
00533     if (getOpt("reference-file") == "") {error("Must specify a reference-file.");}
00534     if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(getOpt("reference-file"))) ) {
00535       Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(getOpt("reference-file")), false);
00536     }
00537     if (getOpt("special-snps") == "") {error("Must specify special-snps.");}
00538     if (getOpt("chrX-probes") == "") {error("Must specify chrX-probes.");}
00539     if (getOpt("chrY-probes") == "") {error("Must specify chrY-probes.");}
00540     if (!getOptBool("create-reference"))
00541     {
00542         if (getOpt("target-sketch") != "") {error("Must not specify target-sketch. It will be read from the Reference.");}
00543         if (getOpt("use-feat-eff") != "") {error("Must not specify use-feat-eff. It will be read from the Reference.");}
00544         if (getOpt("read-models-brlmmp") != "") {error("Must not specify read-model-brlmmp. It will be read from the Reference.");}
00545     }
00546     if (celfile_count == 0)
00547     {
00548         error("Must specify at least one cel-file.");
00549     }
00550 
00551     if (Fs::isReadable(getOpt("reference-file"))) {
00552             if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(getOpt("reference-file"))) {Verbose::out(1, "Input reference is in HDF5 format.");}
00553             if (!getOptBool("create-reference"))
00554               {
00555                 if (!affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(getOpt("reference-file"))){error("Text format reference-file is not supported in apt-copynumber-workflow.");}
00556                 AffxString strAnnotationFileName;
00557                 if (getAnnotationFileName(getOpt("reference-file"), strAnnotationFileName))
00558                   {
00559                     if (strAnnotationFileName.endsWith(".csv")) {strAnnotationFileName = strAnnotationFileName.substring(0, strAnnotationFileName.length() - 4) + ".db";}
00560                     if (Fs::basename(strAnnotationFileName) != Fs::basename(getOpt("annotation-file")))
00561                       {
00562                         error("Annotation file name does not match the reference file.");
00563                       }
00564                     int iNormalizationType = -1;
00565                     int iSampleCount = -1;
00566                     bool bAdapterTypeNormalization = false;
00567                     if (getNormalizationTypes(getOpt("reference-file"), iNormalizationType, bAdapterTypeNormalization, iSampleCount))
00568                       {
00569                         if(iSampleCount != -1)
00570                           {
00571                             setOpt("sample-count",ToStr(iSampleCount));
00572                           }
00573                         if (iNormalizationType != getOptInt("normalization-type"))
00574                           {
00575                             error("Selected Normalization Type does not match reference.");
00576                           }
00577                         if (bAdapterTypeNormalization != getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization"))
00578                           {
00579                             error("Selected Adapter Type Normalization does not match reference.");
00580                           }
00581                       } else {error("Cannot open reference-file: " + getOpt("reference-file"));}
00582                   }
00583                 else
00584                   {
00585                     error("Cannot retreive the annotation file name from the reference file.");
00586                   }
00587               }
00588           }
00589     else if (!getOptBool("create-reference")) {error("Cannot open reference-file: " + getOpt("reference-file"));}
00590     if (getOptBool("run-geno-qc"))
00591     {
00592         if (getOpt("qca-file") == "") {error("Please specify a qca-file.");}
00593         if (getOpt("qcc-file") == "") {error("Please specify a qcc-file.");}
00594     }
00595 
00596     if (getOptVector("arrs").size() > 0)
00597     {
00598         if (getOptVector("arrs").size() != celfile_count)
00599         {
00600           error("When specifying ARR files, the number of ARR files specified must match the number of CEL files specified .");
00601         }
00602         for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < getOptVector("arrs").size()); uiIndex++)
00603         {
00604             AffxString strCelFileName = getOptVector("cels")[uiIndex];
00605             AffxString strArrFileName = getOptVector("arrs")[uiIndex];
00606             if (strArrFileName == "")
00607             {
00608                 AffxString strTempFileName = strCelFileName;
00609                 if (strTempFileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(".cel"))
00610                 {
00611                     strArrFileName = strCelFileName.substring(0, (unsigned int)strCelFileName.length() - 4) + ".ARR";
00612                 }
00613                 else
00614                 {
00615                     strArrFileName = strCelFileName + ".ARR";
00616                 }
00617                 if (Fs::fileExists(strArrFileName)) {getOptVector("arrs")[uiIndex] = strArrFileName;}
00618             }
00619             else
00620             {
00621                 if (!Fs::fileExists(strArrFileName)) {error("Cannot find ARR file: " + strArrFileName);}
00622             }
00623             // TODO: Check to see that ARR guid matches CEL file header.
00624         }
00625     }
00626 
00627     if (getOptVector("result-files").size() > 0)
00628     {
00629         if (getOptVector("result-files").size() != celfile_count)
00630         {
00631           error("When specifying CHP files, the number of chp file names specified with result-files must match the number of CEL files specified .");
00632         }
00633         for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < getOptVector("arrs").size()); uiIndex++)
00634         {
00635             AffxString strChpFileName = getOptVector("result-files")[uiIndex];
00636             if (strChpFileName != "")
00637             {
00638               if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(strChpFileName)) ) {
00639                 Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(strChpFileName), false);
00640               }
00641             }
00642         }
00643     }
00644 
00645     CNReferenceEngine objCNReferenceEngine;
00646     objCNReferenceEngine.setEngine(this);
00647     objCNReferenceEngine.checkOptions();
00648     objCNReferenceEngine.clear();
00649 
00650     CNLog2RatioEngine objCNLog2RatioEngine;
00651     objCNLog2RatioEngine.setEngine(this);
00652     objCNLog2RatioEngine.checkOptions();
00653     objCNLog2RatioEngine.clear();
00654 
00655     if ((!getOptBool("cychp-output")) && (!getOptBool("cnchp-output")))
00656     {
00657         throw(Except("Must specify either cychp-ouptut or cnchp-output."));
00658     }
00659     checkChipType();
00660 
00661   Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("out-dir"), false);
00662   Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("temp-dir"), false);
00663 
00664     if ((getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method") != "none") && (getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method") != ""))
00665     {
00666         CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00667         CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00668         am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method"));
00669         delete am;
00670     }
00671     if ((getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != "none") && (getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != ""))
00672     {
00673         CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00674         CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00675         am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method"));
00676         delete am;
00677     }
00678 }
00679 /**
00680  * @brief checks if there is enough disk space for diskmarts in the
00681  * temp-dir and for chp files in out-dir
00682  */
00683 void CNWorkflowEngine::checkDiskSpaceImp() {
00684   int64_t out_disk_available = -1, scratch_disk_available = -1;
00685 
00686   int cel_count = getOptVector("cels").size();
00687   int probeset_count = getOptInt("probeset-count");
00688 
00689   std::vector<std::string> result_files = getOptVector("result-files");
00690   std::string out_dir;
00691   if (!result_files.empty()) {
00692     //int dir_end = result_files[0].rfind(PATH_SEPARATOR);
00693     //if (dir_end != result_files[0].npos) {
00694     //  out_dir = string(result_files[0],0,dir_end);
00695     //}
00696     //else {
00697     //  out_dir = ".";
00698     //}
00699     out_dir=Fs::dirname(result_files[0]);
00700     // @todo iterate through all of the result dirs to check available
00701     // disk space
00702   }
00703 
00704   if (out_dir.empty()) {
00705     out_dir = getOpt("out-dir");
00706   }
00707 
00708   out_disk_available = Fs::getFreeDiskSpace(out_dir, false);
00709 
00710   uint64_t out_disk_needed = 0;
00711   if (getOptBool("cnchp-output")) {
00712     out_disk_needed += static_cast<uint64_t>(probeset_count) * cel_count * 42.08;
00713     if (getOptBool("text-output")) {
00714       out_disk_needed += static_cast<uint64_t>(probeset_count) * cel_count * 52.64;
00715     }
00716   }
00717 
00718   if (getOptBool("cychp-output")) {
00719     out_disk_needed += static_cast<uint64_t>(probeset_count) * cel_count * 42.08;
00720     if (getOptBool("text-output")) {
00721       out_disk_needed += static_cast<uint64_t>(probeset_count) * cel_count * 66.04;
00722     }
00723   }
00724 
00725   uint64_t scratch_disk_needed = static_cast<uint64_t>(cel_count) * probeset_count * 16.04;
00726 
00727   std::string temp_dir = getOpt("temp-dir");
00728   AptErr_t aptErr = APT_OK;
00729   bool same_disk = Fs::isSameVolume(temp_dir, out_dir, aptErr, false);
00730   if (temp_dir.empty() ||
00731       same_disk||
00732       ((aptErr != APT_OK ) && (temp_dir == out_dir))
00733       ) {
00734     out_disk_needed += scratch_disk_needed;
00735   }
00736   else {
00737     scratch_disk_available = Fs::getFreeDiskSpace(temp_dir, false);
00738     if (scratch_disk_needed > 0 &&
00739         scratch_disk_available >= 0 &&
00740         scratch_disk_needed >= scratch_disk_available) {
00741       // format in kb
00742       scratch_disk_needed = (scratch_disk_needed + 512) / 1024;
00743       scratch_disk_available = (scratch_disk_available + 512) / 1024;
00744       Err::errAbort("In " + temp_dir + ", need " + ToStr(scratch_disk_needed) + "kb of scratch diskspace.  Only " + ToStr(scratch_disk_available) + "kb available.");
00745     }
00746   }
00747 
00748   if (out_disk_needed > 0 &&
00749       out_disk_available >= 0 &&
00750       out_disk_needed >= out_disk_available) {
00751     // format in kb
00752     out_disk_needed = (out_disk_needed + 512) / 1024;
00753     out_disk_available = (out_disk_available + 512) / 1024;
00754     Err::errAbort("In " + out_dir + ", need " + ToStr(out_disk_needed) + "kb of diskspace.  Only " + ToStr(out_disk_available) + "kb available.");
00755   }
00756 }
00757 
00758 /**
00759  * @brief Run the specified analysis
00760  */
00761 void CNWorkflowEngine::runImp() {
00762     // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
00763   // called if exceptions thrown.
00764   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00765     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00766         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00767         CNAnalysisMethodFactory objFactory;
00768         std::vector<std::string> analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00769         for (int i = 0; (i < (int)analysis.size()); i++)
00770         {
00771             Verbose::out(1, analysis[i]);
00772             // Verify analysis method parameters.
00773             CNAnalysisMethod* p = objFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(analysis[i]);
00774             if (p != NULL) {delete p;}
00775         }
00776         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00777         calculateGenders();
00778         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00779         if (m_apgEngine == NULL) {m_apgEngine = new ProbesetGenotypeEngine;}
00780         if (getOptBool("create-reference"))
00781         {
00782             // Reference Creation Workflow
00783             setupReferenceRunParameters();
00784             Verbose::out(1, m_apgEngine->getOpt("analysis"));
00785             Verbose::out(1, m_apgEngine->getOpt("qmethod-spec"));
00786             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00787             if (getOptBool("run-geno-qc")) {callGenoQCEngine();}
00788             if (getOptBool("run-probeset-genotype")) {callProbesetGenotypeEngine();}
00789             callCNReferenceEngine();
00790             callCNLog2RatioEngine();
00791         }
00792         else
00793         {
00794             // CopyNumber Workflow
00795             setupCopyNumberRunParameters();
00796             Verbose::out(1, m_apgEngine->getOpt("analysis"));
00797             Verbose::out(1, m_apgEngine->getOpt("qmethod-spec"));
00798             Verbose::out(1, "*");
00799             if (getOptBool("run-geno-qc")) {callGenoQCEngine();}
00800             if (getOptBool("run-probeset-genotype")) {callProbesetGenotypeEngine();}
00801             callCNLog2RatioEngine();
00802         }
00803     } // inner try end
00804     catch (...) {
00805       // Free up any allocated memory here...
00806       clear();
00807       removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
00808       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00809       throw;
00810     }
00811   } // outer try end
00812   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00813   catch(Except &e) {
00814     Verbose::out(0,"");
00815     error("Exception caught. "
00816                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00817   }
00818   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00819     Verbose::out(0,"");
00820     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00821                   "The application has run out of memory. "
00822                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00823   }
00824   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00825     Verbose::out(0,"");
00826     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00827                    "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00828                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00829   }
00830   catch(BroadException &e) {
00831     Verbose::out(0,"");
00832     error("BroadException caught. "
00833                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00834                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00835   }
00836   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00837     Verbose::out(0,"");
00838     error("std::exception caught. "
00839                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00840   }
00841   catch(const BaseException &e) {
00842     Verbose::out(0,"");
00843     error("newmat BaseException caught. "
00844                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00845   }
00846   catch(...) {
00847     Verbose::out(0,"");
00848     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00849                   "No message is available.");
00850   }
00851   // free any allocated memory here...
00852   clear();
00853   removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
00854 }
00855 
00856 /**
00857  * @brief Setup the parameters for the apg runs.
00858  */
00859 void CNWorkflowEngine::setupParameters()
00860 {
00861     if (getOpt("temp-dir") == "") {
00862     setOpt("temp-dir",Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"temp"));
00863   }
00864     m_apgEngine->setOpt("male-thresh", getOpt("male-gender-ratio-cutoff"));
00865     m_apgEngine->setOpt("female-thresh", getOpt("female-gender-ratio-cutoff"));
00866     m_apgEngine->setOpt("use-disk", ToStr(getOptBool("use-disk")));
00867     m_apgEngine->setOpt("disk-cache", ToStr(getOptInt("disk-cache")));
00868     m_apgEngine->setOpt("temp-dir", getOpt("temp-dir"));
00869     m_apgEngine->setOpt("prior-size", ToStr(getOptInt("prior-size")));
00870     m_apgEngine->setOpt("verbose",  ToStr(getOptInt("verbose")));
00871     m_apgEngine->setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00872     m_apgEngine->setOpt("command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
00873     m_apgEngine->setOpt("program-cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
00874     m_apgEngine->setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00875     m_apgEngine->setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
00876     m_apgEngine->setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00877     m_apgEngine->setOpt("version-to-report", getOpt("program-version") + " " + getOpt("program-name"));
00878     m_apgEngine->setOpt("probeset-ids", getOpt("probeset-ids"));
00879     m_apgEngine->setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00880     m_apgEngine->setOpt("cdf-file", getOpt("cdf-file"));
00881     m_apgEngine->setOpt("spf-file", getOpt("spf-file"));
00882     m_apgEngine->setOpt("set-gender-method", getOpt("gender-method"));
00883     m_apgEngine->setOpt("chrX-probes", getOpt("chrX-probes"));
00884     m_apgEngine->setOpt("chrY-probes", getOpt("chrY-probes"));
00885     m_apgEngine->setOpt("special-snps", getOpt("special-snps"));
00886     m_apgEngine->setOpt("annotation-file", getOpt("annotation-file"));
00887 
00888     AffxString strAnalysisString;
00889     if (getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization"))
00890     {
00891         if (getOpt("adapter-parameters") == "") {setOpt("adapter-parameters", AdapterTypeNormTran::getDefaultOptions());}
00892         strAnalysisString = "adapter-type-norm";
00893         if (getOpt("adapter-parameters") != "")
00894         {
00895             strAnalysisString += ".";
00896             strAnalysisString += getOpt("adapter-parameters");
00897         }
00898         strAnalysisString += ",";
00899     }
00900     if (getOptInt("cancer") > 0)
00901     {
00902         strAnalysisString += "intensity-reporter.file='" + Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),getOpt("set-analysis-name")) + ".Intensities.a5',";
00903     }
00904     switch (getOptInt("normalization-type"))
00905     {
00906     case 0: break;
00907     case 1: strAnalysisString = strAnalysisString + "quant-norm.bioc=false,"; break;
00908     case 2: strAnalysisString = strAnalysisString + "med-norm.target=1000,"; break;
00909     default: throw(Except("Normalization type must be one of 1 = quant-norm, or 2 = med-norm.target=1000."));
00910     }
00911     strAnalysisString += "pm-only,brlmm-p." + getOpt("brlmmp-parameters");
00912     m_apgEngine->setOpt("analysis",strAnalysisString);
00913     if (getOptBool("create-reference"))
00914     {
00915         m_apgEngine->setOpt("qmethod-spec", "plier.optmethod=1.FixFeatureEffect=true");
00916         setOpt("log2-input", "false");
00917     }
00918     else
00919     {
00920         m_apgEngine->setOpt("qmethod-spec", "plier.optmethod=1.FixFeatureEffect=true.SafetyZero=0");
00921         setOpt("log2-input", "false");
00922     }
00923     setOpt("genotype-analysis", m_apgEngine->getOpt("analysis"));
00924     setOpt("qmethod-spec", m_apgEngine->getOpt("qmethod-spec"));
00925 
00926     m_apgEngine->setOpt("all-types", "true" );
00927     m_apgEngine->setOpt("force", getOpt("force"));
00928     m_apgEngine->setOpt("table-output", "false" );
00929     m_apgEngine->setOpt("summaries", "false" );
00930     m_apgEngine->setOpt("xda-chp-output", "false" );
00931     m_apgEngine->setOpt("cc-chp-output", "false" );
00932     m_apgEngine->setOpt("feat-details", "false" );
00933     m_apgEngine->setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name") );
00934     m_apgEngine->setOpt("feat-details", "false" );
00935     m_apgEngine->setOpt("include-quant-in-report-file-name", "true" );
00936 }
00937 
00938 /**
00939  * @brief Setup the parameters (specific to the reference run) for the aps and apg runs.
00940  */
00941 void CNWorkflowEngine::setupReferenceRunParameters()
00942 {
00943     setupParameters();
00944     m_apgEngine->setOpt("use-feat-eff", getOpt("use-feat-eff"));
00945     m_apgEngine->setOpt("target-sketch", getOpt("target-sketch"));
00946     m_apgEngine->setOpt("read-models-brlmmp", getOpt("read-models-brlmmp"));
00947     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-global-file", getOpt("reference-file"));
00948     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-calls", "true" );
00949     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-calls-use-global", "false" );
00950     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects", "true" );
00951     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects-use-global", "true" );
00952     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-details", "false" );
00953     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-details-use-global", "false" );
00954     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch", "true" );
00955     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-use-global", "true" );
00956     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-summaries", "true" );
00957     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-summaries-use-global", "false" );
00958     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-write-models", "true" );
00959     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-write-models-use-global", "true" );
00960     m_apgEngine->setOpt("feat-effects", "false" );
00961     m_apgEngine->setOpt("write-sketch", "false" );
00962     m_apgEngine->setOpt("write-models", "false" );
00963     m_apgEngine->setOpt("out-dir", getOpt("out-dir"));
00964   m_apgEngine->setOpt("writeOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile", "true");
00965 
00966   string outDir = m_apgEngine->getOpt("out-dir");
00967   string setAnalysisName = m_apgEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00968   if ( !Fs::dirExists(outDir)) {
00969     Fs::mkdirPath(outDir, false);
00970   }
00971 
00972   setOpt("genotype-report-file", Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".report.txt"));
00973   setOpt("expr-summary-file",    Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".plier.summary.a5"));
00974     setOpt("genotype-calls-file",  Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".calls.a5"));
00975     setOpt("genotype-confidences-file", Fs::join(outDir,setAnalysisName + ".confidences.a5"));
00976 }
00977 
00978 /**
00979  * @brief Setup the parameters (specific to the copynumber run) for the aps and apg runs.
00980  */
00981 void CNWorkflowEngine::setupCopyNumberRunParameters()
00982 {
00983     setupParameters();
00984     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-global-file", "" );
00985     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-calls", "true" );
00986     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-calls-use-global", "false" );
00987     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-summaries", "true" );
00988     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-summaries-use-global", "false" );
00989     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects", "true" );
00990     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects-use-global", "false" );
00991     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-details", "false" );
00992     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-details-use-global", "false" );
00993     if (getOptInt("normalization-type") == 1)
00994     {
00995         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch", "true" );
00996     }
00997     else
00998     {
00999         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch", "false" );
01000     }
01001     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-use-global", "false" );
01002     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-write-models", "true" );
01003     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-write-models-use-global", "false" );
01004     m_apgEngine->setOpt("feat-effects", "false" );
01005     m_apgEngine->setOpt("write-sketch", "false" );
01006     m_apgEngine->setOpt("write-models", "false" );
01007     m_apgEngine->setOpt("out-dir", getOpt("out-dir"));
01008 
01009   string outDir = m_apgEngine->getOpt("out-dir");
01010   string setAnalysisName = m_apgEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
01011 
01012   setOpt("genotype-report-file", Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".report.txt"));
01013     setOpt("expr-summary-file",    Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".plier.summary.a5"));
01014     setOpt("genotype-calls-file",  Fs::join(outDir, setAnalysisName + ".calls.a5"));
01015     setOpt("genotype-confidences-file", Fs::join(outDir,setAnalysisName + ".confidences.a5"));
01016 
01017   m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-global-input-file", getOpt("reference-file"));
01018   // grab "strGlobalPrefix" from the reference file (Cause it could be different.)
01019   // the report names below are relative to "m_a5_global_input_groupname"
01020     AffxString strGlobalPrefix;
01021     if (!getAnalysisName(getOpt("reference-file"), strGlobalPrefix)) {
01022         throw(Except("Cannot find global prefix in reference-file."));
01023     }
01024     else {
01025         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-input-group", strGlobalPrefix );
01026     }
01027 
01028     if (getOptInt("normalization-type") == 1)
01029     {
01030         // == SKETCH
01031         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-input-global", "true" );
01032         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-input-name", "target-sketch" );
01033     }
01034     else
01035     {
01036         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-input-global", "false" );
01037         m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-sketch-input-name", "" );
01038     }
01039     // == FEATURE-EFFECTS
01040     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-global", "true" );
01041     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-name",
01042             strGlobalPrefix+".plier.feature-response" );
01043     // == MODELS
01044     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-models-input-global", "true" );
01045     m_apgEngine->setOpt("a5-models-input-name", strGlobalPrefix+".snp-posteriors" );
01046 }

01048 /**
01049 * @brief Call the geno-qc engine
01050 */
01051 void CNWorkflowEngine::callGenoQCEngine()
01052 {
01053     GenoQC engine;
01054     engine.setOpt("force", getOpt("force"));
01055     engine.setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
01056     engine.setOpt("command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
01057     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
01058     engine.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
01059     engine.setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
01060     engine.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
01061     engine.setOpt("version-to-report", getOpt("program-version") + " " + getOpt("program-name"));
01062     engine.setOpt("cdf-file", getOpt("cdf-file"));
01063     engine.setOpt("spf-file", getOpt("spf-file"));
01064     engine.setOpt("chrX-probes", getOpt("chrX-probes"));
01065     engine.setOpt("chrY-probes", getOpt("chrY-probes"));
01066     engine.setOpt("qca-file", getOpt("qca-file"));
01067     engine.setOpt("qcc-file", getOpt("qcc-file"));
01068     engine.setOpt("out-file", getOpt("geno-qc-file"));
01069     std::vector<std::string> cels = getOptVector("cels");
01070     engine.setOpt("cels", cels);
01071     engine.run();
01072 }

01113 /**
01114  * @brief Return the annotation file names
01115  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the reference file
01116  * @param AffxString& - The name of the snp annotation file to return
01117  * @param AffxString& - The name of the cn annotation file to return
01118  * @return bool - true if successful
01119  */
01120 bool CNWorkflowEngine::getAnnotationFileName(const AffxString& strFileName, AffxString& strAnnotationFileName)
01121 {
01122     bool bSuccessful = false;
01123     strAnnotationFileName = "";
01124     AffxString strOldAnnotationFileName;
01125     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
01126     {
01127         AffxString str;
01128         try
01129         {
01130             affx::File5_File file5;
01131             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01132             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01133             if (group5 != NULL)
01134             {
01135             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01136             if (tsv5 != NULL)
01137             {
01138             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01139             {
01140                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
01141                 int iIndex = str.indexOf("=");
01142                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01143                 if (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-annotation-file=")) {strAnnotationFileName = str.substring(iIndex + 1);}
01144                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01145                 if (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-netaffx-snp-annotation-file=")) {strOldAnnotationFileName = str.substring(iIndex + 1);}
01146             }
01147             tsv5->close();
01148             delete tsv5;
01149             }
01150             group5->close();
01151             delete group5;
01152             }
01153             file5.close();
01154             if (strAnnotationFileName != "") {bSuccessful = true;}
01155         } catch(...) {return false;}
01156     }
01157     if ((strAnnotationFileName == "") && (strOldAnnotationFileName != ""))
01158     {
01159         strAnnotationFileName = strOldAnnotationFileName;
01160         bSuccessful = true;
01161     }
01162     return bSuccessful;
01163 }
01164 
01165 /**
01166  * @brief Return the normalization types
01167  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the reference file
01168  * @param int& - The normalization type
01169  * @param bool& - The adapter normalization
01170  * @param bool& - The marker normalization
01171  * @return bool - true if successful
01172  */
01173 // This method is called by GTC without having called checkOptions.
01174 // In short, best not to refer to Engine options/state in this method
01175 bool CNWorkflowEngine::getNormalizationTypes(const AffxString& strFileName, int& iNormalizationType, bool& bAdapterNormalization, int& iSampleCount)
01176 {
01177     bool bSuccessful = false;
01178     AffxByteArray ba;
01179     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
01180     {
01181         AffxString str;
01182         try
01183         {
01184             affx::File5_File file5;
01185             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01186             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01187             if (group5 != NULL)
01188             {
01189             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01190             if (tsv5 != NULL)
01191             {
01192             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01193             {
01194                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
01195                 int iIndex = str.indexOf("=");
01196                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01197                 if (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-normalization-type="))
01198                 {
01199                     iNormalizationType = ::getInt(str.substring(iIndex + 1));
01200                 }
01201                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01202                 if ((str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-celFileCount=")) ||
01203                     (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-sample-count=")) )
01204                 {
01205                     iSampleCount = ::getInt(str.substring(iIndex + 1));
01206                 }
01207                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01208                 if ((str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-adapter-normalization=")) ||
01209                     (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-adapter-type-normalization=")))
01210                 {
01211                     ba.assign(str.substring(iIndex + 1));
01212                     bAdapterNormalization = ba.parsebool();
01213                 }
01214             }
01215             tsv5->close();
01216             delete tsv5;
01217             }
01218             group5->close();
01219             delete group5;
01220             }
01221             file5.close();
01222             bSuccessful = true;
01223         } catch(...) {return false;}
01224     }
01225     return bSuccessful;
01226 }

01277 /**
01278  * @brief Return the reference gender counts
01279  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the reference file
01280  * @param int& - The reference male count
01281  * @param int& - The reference female count
01282  * @param int& - The reference unknown gender count
01283  * @return bool - true if successful
01284  */
01285 bool CNWorkflowEngine::getReferenceGenderCounts(const AffxString& strFileName, int& iReferenceMaleCount, int& iReferenceFemaleCount, int& iReferenceUnknownCount)
01286 {
01287     iReferenceMaleCount = -1;
01288     iReferenceFemaleCount = -1;
01289     iReferenceUnknownCount = -1;
01290     bool bSuccessful = false;
01291     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
01292     {
01293         AffxString str;
01294         try
01295         {
01296             affx::File5_File file5;
01297             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01298             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01299             if (group5 != NULL)
01300             {
01301             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01302             if (tsv5 != NULL)
01303             {
01304             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01305             {
01306                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
01307                 int iIndex = str.indexOf("=");
01308                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01309                 if ((str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-ReferenceMaleCount=")) || (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-reference-male-sample-count="))) {iReferenceMaleCount = ::getInt(str.substring(iIndex + 1));}
01310                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01311                 if ((str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-ReferenceFemaleCount=")) || (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-reference-female-sample-count="))) {iReferenceFemaleCount = ::getInt(str.substring(iIndex + 1));}
01312                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
01313                 if ((str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-ReferenceUnknownCount=")) || (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-reference-unknown-sample-count="))) {iReferenceUnknownCount = ::getInt(str.substring(iIndex + 1));}
01314             }
01315             tsv5->close();
01316             delete tsv5;
01317             }
01318             group5->close();
01319             delete group5;
01320             }
01321             file5.close();
01322             if (iReferenceMaleCount != -1) {bSuccessful = true;}
01323         } catch(...) {return false;}
01324     }
01325     return bSuccessful;
01326 }
01327 
01328 /**
01329  * @brief Calculate the genders of the specified samples (cel files)
01330  */
01331 void CNWorkflowEngine::calculateGenders()
01332 {
01333     CnProbeGenderCelListener objGenderCaller(getOpt("chrX-probes"), getOpt("chrY-probes"), getOptDouble("female-gender-ratio-cutoff"), getOptDouble("male-gender-ratio-cutoff"));
01334     affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
01335     int iUnknownCount = 0;
01336     int iMaleCount = 0;
01337     int iFemaleCount = 0;
01338     std::vector<std::string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
01339     for (unsigned int uiCelFileIndex = 0; (uiCelFileIndex < celFiles.size()); uiCelFileIndex++)
01340     {
01341         cel.SetFileName(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex].c_str());
01342         if (!cel.Read()) {error("Cannot read cel file for gender calling: " + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);}
01343         objGenderCaller.newChip(&cel);
01344         cel.Close();
01345         switch(objGenderCaller.getLastGender())
01346         {
01347         case affx::Male: iMaleCount++; Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) + ":\t" + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) + "\tMale"); break;
01348         case affx::Female: iFemaleCount++; Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) + ":\t" + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) + "\tFemale"); break;
01349         default: iUnknownCount++; Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) + ":\t" + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) + "\tUnknown");
01350         }
01351     }
01352     Verbose::out(1, "*");
01353     Verbose::out(1, "The cel file input contains " + ::getInt(iFemaleCount) + " female, " + ::getInt(iMaleCount) + " male, and " + ::getInt(iUnknownCount) + " unknown genders.");
01354     if (getOptBool("create-reference"))
01355     {
01356         setOpt("reference-male-sample-count", ::getInt(iMaleCount));
01357         setOpt("reference-female-sample-count", ::getInt(iFemaleCount));
01358         setOpt("reference-unknown-sample-count", ::getInt(iUnknownCount));
01359         int iSampleCount = iMaleCount + iFemaleCount + iUnknownCount;
01360         setOpt("reference-sample-count", ::getInt(iSampleCount));
01361 
01362         if (iSampleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference will be based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-sample-count") + " samples.");}
01363         if (iMaleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-male-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference will be based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-male-sample-count") + " male samples.");}
01364         if (iFemaleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-female-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference will be based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-female-sample-count") + " female samples.");}
01365     }
01366     else
01367     {
01368         int iReferenceMaleCount = 0;
01369         int iReferenceFemaleCount = 0;
01370         int iReferenceUnknownCount = 0;
01371         if (getReferenceGenderCounts(getOpt("reference-file"), iReferenceMaleCount, iReferenceFemaleCount, iReferenceUnknownCount))
01372         {
01373             setOpt("reference-male-sample-count", ::getInt(iReferenceMaleCount));
01374             setOpt("reference-female-sample-count", ::getInt(iReferenceFemaleCount));
01375             setOpt("reference-unknown-sample-count", ::getInt(iReferenceUnknownCount));
01376             int iSampleCount = iReferenceMaleCount + iReferenceFemaleCount + iReferenceUnknownCount;
01377             setOpt("reference-sample-count", ::getInt(iSampleCount));
01378             Verbose::out(1, "The reference input is based on " + ::getInt(iReferenceFemaleCount) + " female, " + ::getInt(iReferenceMaleCount) + " male, and " + ::getInt(iReferenceUnknownCount) + " unknown genders.");
01379             if (iSampleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference is based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-sample-count") + " samples.");}
01380             if (iReferenceMaleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-male-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference is based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-male-sample-count") + " male samples.");}
01381             if (iReferenceFemaleCount < getOptInt("recommended-reference-female-sample-count")) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Reference is based on less than " + getOpt("recommended-reference-female-sample-count") + " female samples.");}
01382             if ((iMaleCount > 0) && (iReferenceMaleCount == 0))
01383             {
01384                 error("Reference input is not based on any male samples.");
01385             }
01386             if ((iFemaleCount > 0) && (iReferenceFemaleCount == 0))
01387             {
01388                 error("Reference input is not based on any female samples.");
01389             }
01390         }
01391     }
01392 }

01406 // Check the chip type
01407 void CNWorkflowEngine::checkChipType()
01408 {
01409     colrow_t numRows = 0, numCols = 0;
01410     int probeCount = 0, probeSetCount = 0, channelCount = 1;
01411     vector<string> chipTypes;
01412 
01413     std::string strCdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
01414     std::string strSpfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
01415     if(strCdfFile != "") {
01416           EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypes, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, strCdfFile);
01417         }
01418         else if(strSpfFile != "") {
01419           EngineUtil::getSpfChipType(chipTypes, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, strSpfFile);
01420         }
01421 
01422     setOpt("num-rows", ToStr(numRows));
01423     setOpt("num-cols", ToStr(numCols));
01424     setOpt("probe-count", ToStr(probeCount));
01425     setOpt("probeset-count", ToStr(probeSetCount));
01426     setOpt("channel-count", ToStr(channelCount));
01427 
01428         if (!getOptBool("force")) {
01429                 std::vector<std::string> cels = getOptVector("cels");
01430                 EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypes, probeCount, cels, numRows, numCols);
01431                 if (getOpt("chrX-probes") != "") {EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(getOpt("chrX-probes"), chipTypes);}
01432                 if (getOpt("chrY-probes") != "") {EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(getOpt("chrY-probes"), chipTypes);}
01433         }
01434 }
01435 
01436 void CNWorkflowEngine::explain() {
01437     CNAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
01438     std::vector<SelfDoc>docs = factory.getDocs();
01439 
01440     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < docs.size(); i++)
01441     {
01442         if(docs[i].getDocName() == getOpt("explain"))
01443         {
01444             SelfDoc::printExplanation(docs[i],cout);
01445         }
01446     }
01447     docs.clear();
01448 }

01450 void CNWorkflowEngine::extraHelp() {
01451     CNAnalysisMethodFactory factory;
01452     printStandardMethods(cout);
01453     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Data transformations:", factory.getDocs());
01454 }

01456 // This method is called by GTC without having called checkOptions.
01457 // In short, best not to refer to Engine options/state in this method
01458 AffxString CNWorkflowEngine::getAnnotationParameter(const AffxString& strFileName, const AffxString& strParameterName)
01459 {
01460     AffxString strParameterValue;
01461     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
01462     {
01463         AffxString str;
01464         try
01465         {
01466             affx::File5_File file5;
01467             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01468             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01469             if (group5 != NULL)
01470             {
01471             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01472             if (tsv5 != NULL)
01473             {
01474             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01475             {
01476                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
01477                 int iIndex = str.indexOf("=");
01478                 if (str.startsWith("#%" + strParameterName + "=")) {strParameterValue = str.substring(iIndex + 1);}
01479             }
01480             tsv5->close();
01481             delete tsv5;
01482             }
01483             group5->close();
01484             delete group5;
01485             }
01486             file5.close();
01487         } catch(...) {return "";}
01488     }
01489     return strParameterValue;
01490 }
